1.title: Introduction

11.content:
So how or why will Coco get fat?

Option 1: Overeating, She been eating a lot more and soon the effects starts to show

Option 2: Laziness, Coco spends more time on her laptop and lazing about... and the pounds start to pile on

Option 3: Forced, Coco has helped Crash beat Cortex a number of times, So Cortex figures she can't help if she too big

or, just in case, if anyone has any more ideas on how or why, pick more...
11.title: Coco Bandicoot

112.content:
*munch munch*

Coco chewed on the mouthful of chips she was eating as she reached over for the TV remote. For the last two weeks Coco had been spent most of her time sitting on the family couch and watching TV. Coco watched the TV when suddenly a shape moved and blocked her view.

“Crash! Get out of the way, I’m trying to watch the TV!” Coco yelled at her brother, sitting up as she glared crossly.
“Hoobahabbja radda!” the older bandicoot replied in his usual gibberish, yet Coco clearly understood what he was saying, she crossed her arms and gave a huff.

“I don’t care if it’s supposed to be my turn to wash the dishes. You agreed to do all my chores for the month in return for me not telling Crunch that you were the one who broke his CD player.” She said, shooting another glare at her brother, “So either you can either do the dishes yourself or I’ll do it and you can explain to Crunch how you broke his CD player.”

“Whoa! Haynajabener!” Crash quickly gibbered, shaking his head before he ran off, heading to the kitchen.

Coco gave a smirk of triumph and resumed watching TV, digging another handful of potato chips out of the bag of chips next to her.
112.title: All play and no work...

1121.content:
After a few hours of watching TV, Coco looked up to the clock on the wall and saw that it was almost time of dinner.

"Oh wow, is that the time?" she said to herself, sitting upright, "well I better go and check on Crash, after all it is his turn to make dinner" she chuckled to herself as she then stood up and started to walk over to the kitchen.

In the kitchen, Coco saw that Crash was still working on the dishes, apparently having made a mess and broke several of them.

"You broke some of the dishes again, big brother?" she teased Crash, who simply replied with a mumble.

"Well Crash, don't forget that it almost time for dinner and it's your turn to make it."

"Wha? Butahabba..."

"Hey, no complaining, it's your turn to cook. So you better get started" and with that, Coco left Crash in the kitchen and returned to the TV.

Half an hour later, Coco heard Crash calling her, letting her know that dinner was ready. Smiling, she headed over were she saw Crash setting the two dinners on the table. Coco sat down and looked at her dinner, which was...
1121.title: Later that day

12.content:
Choose your scenario:

Option 1: Love: self explanatory Colleen Loves Hunter but hunter is into fat women so Colleen willingly packs on as many pounds as she can to win his heart.

Option 2: Laziness: Post Early Retirement years have not been kind to her figure.

Option 3: Accidental: A device meant to curb Muzzle's appetite backfires and instead ends up transferring the hunger into Colleen.

Option 4: Force Fed: A mission goes horribly wrong... or perhaps someone in the rovers just wants her fatter.

Option 5: Addiction: A new type of dog treat is tested Colleen tries one out of curiosity side effects include addiction to the snack and extreme weight gain.
12.title: Colleen

14.content: Now, how will Sabrina expand?
14.title: Sabrina Skunk

choices: She ignores it.. For the night.
141.content:
Chain Mail it is, then!


Now, nobody likes chain letters, due to them being annoying and repetitive. While a lot of them are just funny or downright ridiculous, this one letter in particular played no mercy...
That was when our pretty skunk, Sabrina, found out the hard way when ignoring chain letters. One night, while on her computer, Sabrina was just browsing her emails when she came across a rather confusing email, titled, "Pass It On or Have A Rather Swell Time!"
141.title: Chain Mail

choices: She sends it to 14 people (Plot twist, she fails to do so).
1412.content:
Curious, she asks herself, "Hm? What's this for?" And clicks on the email. The email says "Hello! I am Percy! You may not know me, but you don't have to! Anyway, I made this letter to tell you something:

I'm here to warn you about a certain entity. His name is The Swell. He is a spirit who is able to inflate other people, preferably girls. But luckily, you can avoid that with this email! You must send this to 14 people who haven't had this email. If exactly 14 people have this email, The Swell won't come for you. If you fail to proceed, he will come. And when he does... Let's just say you'll have a rather explosive experience. ;)
Bye!

-Percy"
1412.title: Clickety!

choices: She starts to get hungry, so she grabs something to eat.
She sleeps to the next day.
14121.content: Having read the whole thing, she just scoffed and said "Bah, another one of those chain letters? These things never really do what they say on the email." And then she put the email in the trash bin, laughing it off there. She was still blabbering on about that stupid email.
14121.title: She simply ignores it.

choices: She goes to the bathroom to get herself cleaned up.
She goes to the kitchen to get herself some breakfast.
141212.content: 7:00 A.M., and Sabrina has just woken up from her beauty sleep. She was still thinking about that blasted email from last night. But she thought to herself, "Egh.. Best not to think about it for too long. Maybe it might happen like the email said. Hahaha! Nah." Little did she know, that would be a very poor choice of words soon. But after that, she got out of bed and then...
141212.title: *Spongebob narrator voice* The Next Day

choices: She still went to the shower.
She skipped the shower for now and ate breakfast.
1412121.content:
Sabrina went to the bathroom to get herself all cleaned up. But first she looked at herself at the mirror and the first thing she saw was her newly rounded belly.
"EEP!" she shrieked before rubbing her belly, making it squeak. "My belly! I-It's big! Could it be..?" She denied this and insisted that it might've been something bad she must've ate.
1412121.title: Wishy Washy, but With Air

14121212.content:
She went to the kitchen with her now inflated belly, noticing that it's lighter to walk all of a sudden. "Man.. I feel so lighter than I used to.. It might be the gas from the food yesterday..."

She goes to the fride to take out 3 slices of waffles. She took the 3 waffles and put then in the toaster to heat them up.

5 minutes later...

*DING!* The waffles were done and toasty! Sabrina took out the syrup and plate, placed the waffles in stacks and then the syrup. Next she took a slice of butter and spread it on the waffles and syrup. She then sits near the table, and gets ready to eat. But then...
14121212.title: Puff 'Er Up!

choices: She quickly runs to her bedroom to the letter.
She quickly tries to run outside to find help.
141212121.content:
Just as she took the 4th bite, Sabrina could feel a funny tingling coming from her breasts.
"Ugghh... My breasts feel all funny... Why does it tickle so much..?"

Suddenly, *FWOOOMP!!* Her breasts both blew up like 2 big balloons, making Sabrina's bottom vision very limited.

"WHAT T-THE-?? First my belly, now my breasts too?! What is going on?!" Sabrina panicked. She didn't know what to do. She quickly stood up and immediately she felt a little bit more lighter than before. "And why do I feel lighter?!" Then it hit her. "Oh god... It's not the food.. It's the letter!" As her breasts kept on inflating along with her belly.
141212121.title: Puff 'Er Up Some More!

choices: She runs to the window (but ends up starting to float, therefore making it hard)
She starts to hear an eerie voice...
1412121212.content: She runs out to the living room and then to the front door when unfortunately her belly and breasts were so big that the doorway couldn't fit anymore for poor ol' Sabrina. She kept struggling to get out of the doorway, but it was no use. She then thinks about the windows. "The windows! T-They might still be big for me to fit in!"
1412121212.title: ...Is It Too Late To Say "I Regret This Deeply?"

choices: Her butt finally inflates and starts to feel something pushing her.
14121212122.content:
"Heheheheheheheh..."

"W-What? Who said that?!" said Sabrina, panicking still.

"It's me, The Swell..."

"You?! You're real?! I thought you were a made up entity!"

"Well, believe it or not, fool, I am quite real than you think. And this is your... Well, let's call it my gift to you..." said The Swell.

"W-What?!' exclaimed Sabrina.

"Yep... And soon after you become ripe to me... You'll be collected by me and will join in the fun with everyone else... hehehe.."

"E-Everyone else??" she asked, in disbelief.

"Yes... Now then... enjoy your life while it lasts, because it seems that you're almost finished... Toodle-loo...!" The Swell's voice echoed through and disappeared.
14121212122.title: ...It's Too Late, Isn't It?

141212121221.content:
The funny tingling in her breasts and belly finally stopped, but instead of disappearing like The Swell's voice, it moved on to Sabrina's butt, the more ticklish part of her body.

*FWWWOOOOOOMPP!!!* Her buttcheeks inflated into two ripe cheeks that looked grope-able.

"Oh great, my ass too?!" But just as her butt started to inflate, she could feel someone pushing her.
"H-Hey, who's p-p-pushing me?! S-stop! Please!!"
After some pushing and some struggling, Sabrina was finally freed from the doorway, fortunately. Unfortunately, she has gotten so big and so light, she started to float. At this point, every part of her body continued to inflate, including her hands, paws, ears, cheeks and tail as they all went *FWOOOOOMP* in unison. Because of her round cheeks, Sabrina was no longer able to speak. Her blue shirt finally gave away, exposing her boobs and making her blush bright red.
"MMMMPHH-!!" She tried her might to scream and cry for help, but her speech was limited due to her big cheeks and the fact she was floating so high. It didn't help that her speech was cut off by squeaks and creaks and groans...
Basically, Sabrina was now one, giant, helpless blimp, for The Swell to take for his collection.
141212121221.title: ...It's Too Late

155333.title: You want obscure I'll give you obscure characters

info.brief_description: Furry Women that are not typically popular WG targets are so here. AT LAST!
info.description:
There are only 5 rules

Rule 1: This is for the less popular Furry girls out there, including a target that has been done countless times before will be removed give the underdog (no pun intended) time to shine.

Rule 2: Stay inside the 13+ rating, there is room for some adult themes but don't go too extreme with it.

Rule 3: Expanding the belly is mandatory. I will not abide Hourglass.

Rule 4: When the story starts they must be skinny, otherwise the expansion will not be obvious and if it's not obvious then there is no story.

Rule 5: OC's while certainly obscure unfortunately will not fit in hear namely because if you literally just made it up than nobody will know about it. But one like the furry girls from Web Comics will be acceptable.

I hope that explains it.
